questions.question: "Do you like this place?" - He asked me ______ I liked that place.
"Is it raining?" - She asked if it ______ raining.
"Can you swim?" - He asked me if I ______ swim.
"Are they students?" - The teacher wanted to know ______ they were students.
"Does she live here?" - Tom asked if she ______ there.
"Will you visit Son Doong Cave?" - Lan asked if we ______ visit Son Doong Cave.
"Are you watching TV?" - Mom asked if I ______ TV then.
"Do you want to go out?" - He asked me if I ______ to go out.
"Did you see the majestic view yesterday?" - He asked if I ______ the majestic view the day before.
"Have you been to Phong Nha?" - She asked if we ______ to Phong Nha.
